frontmatter.title: Soft Real-Time Task Re-Prioritizer (C / BASH / Raspbian OS)

markdownRemark.html:
Soft Real-Time Task Re-Prioritizer (C / BASH / Raspbian OS)

Sep 2018 - Dec 2018 | San Diego State University

Embedded Operating Systems & Student Research Symposium Project -Collaborated and assisted in designing a system to improve operating system performance within the Linux user space. -Utilized a combination of BASH scripts and C programs to create a system benchmark. -Analyzed performance metrics to find the impact of ‘nice’ values on Context Switches and Task Completion Time.
